name: Sonarr compact menu
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Streamlines the Sonarr menu for better viewing on laptop monitors. Hides the search box (seriously, I never use this!)
obsoletion_message: Not needed if you run Sonarr Preview which you should
additional_info:
You need to change the URL in the CSS to match your setup!

To install into Sonarr permanently, add this CSS (without the URL specifier) into:

/Applications/Sonarr.app/Contents/MacOS/UI/Content/info.css (on Mac)

But please note it may be wiped if you do an app update!
